page.title: 18'LIFE FOR A FARMER'S WIFE'
page.content: { { Mrs. Joyce Trevethan (Penponds Farm) ____________________________________ Joyce Trevethan, wife of William Trevethan, has her time fully occupied helping in the work at the 42-acre Penponds Farm. As well as the farm work, Mrs. Trevethan enjoys gardening and looking after the home, with her husband and 2 sons; Mark (18 yrs.) is soon going to Bristol Polytechnic College for a 4-year B.A. honours degree course in Town Planning, and Richard (15 yrs.) is studying for C.S.E. exams next summer at Richard Lander Comprehensive School, in Truro. Mrs. Trevethan visits her parents and parents-in-law weekly and gives them general help. Along with her husband she is an active member of the Threemilestone Methodist Church.
